body:
Nav Squad Commandos rules text and the stack event say it gets +1/+1 when its battalion clause triggers, but it actually gets +2/+2. That is, everywhere it says it gets +1/+1, but it turns from a 3/5 into a 5/7, when it should become 4/6.

MAGARENA VERSION 1.41, JRE 1.7.0_25, OS Windows XP_5.1 x86
author: [core...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103434827021553153452/)
title: Nav Squad Commandos gets +2/+2 from battalion
